greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Varga constant.
comment: Equals the reciprocal of the one-ninth constant A072558.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Alphonse P. Magnus and Jean Meinguet, The elliptic functions and integrals of the '1/9' problem
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, One-Ninth Constant
mathematica: nmax=250; c = k /. FindRoot[EllipticK[k^2] == 2*EllipticE[k^2], {k, 9/10}, WorkingPrecision -> nmax]; Take[RealDigits[1/N[Exp[-Pi*(EllipticK[1 - c^2]/EllipticK[c^2])], nmax]][[1]], 200] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 10 2018 *)
RealDigits[v /. FindRoot[4 EllipticE[InverseEllipticNomeQ[1/v]] == Pi EllipticTheta[3, 0, 1/v]^2, {v, 9, 9, 10}, WorkingPrecision -> 101]][[1]] (* _Jan Mangaldan_, Jun 25 2020 *)
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 03 2002
